text: Southport – Burleigh Road is a state controlled road in the city of Gold Coast in the Australian state of Queensland. It is designated as State Route 3 and runs from Southport to Burleigh Heads. It includes four former suburban streets, which are still known locally by their original names. They are (from north to south): * High Street * Ferry Road * Bundall Road * Bermuda Street ==Major intersections== The road is in the Gold Coast local government area. ==See also== ==References== Category:Roads on the Gold Coast, Queensland
title: Southport – Burleigh Road
